about_the_game:
Rosas are Red is an adult texting-based game where you talk to a kind-hearted girl named Rosa! As you get to know her, she'll happily fool around with you and send you fun little pictures.

Mobile Interface

Everything in Rosas are Red is made to look like a phone. You'll find yourself right at home as if you were on your own real-world phone. Whether you're messing with the settings or looking in your gallery to see the nice pictures that Rosa sends you, it'll all look like you're really on your phone.

Wholesome Pictures

As you play through the game and make the right choices, Rosa will reward you with lots of lewd pictures that you probably shouldn't show your family. You'll be able to review these pictures as they get saved to your gallery. Happy zooming!

Influence Rosa

Your choices will help shape Rosa's behavior, causing her to respond in different ways based on what kind of relationship you have with her.

content_descriptors.notes: Explicit depictions of nudity and sexual acts in the form of pictures and sexting.

name: Rosas are Red Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and Windows 10. Workstation, laptop and tablet form factors, running on device without emulation or compatibility layer.
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 Capable.
  • Storage: 820 MB available space

short_description: Meet Rosa, a girl on the internet with no problems opening up to strangers over text! Choose what you want to say, and what you want her to do over a familiar phone interface!
